summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Kenyon Street from 34th Avenue Southwest to 39th Avenue Sothwest; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15382 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
